caption.p: Visualisation of the course of a FRAP experiments. These images displayed the recovery of fluorescence of the 1.3-nm PEG-rhodamine probe within a ROI located on the cell wall of an IL-pretreated poplar section (dark area inside the white circle). a Before bleaching, b immediately after bleaching, c 10 s after bleaching, d 10 min after bleaching. Scale bar: 5 nm
